CustomField.formula:
IF(Is_Conditional__c,case( slab_calc_method__c , "Inc Qty",
IF(Base_Quantity_Nego__c >= Slab_1__c && (Base_Quantity_Nego__c < Slab_2__c || ISBLANK(Slab_2__c)), 1 , IF(Base_Quantity_Nego__c >= Slab_2__c && (Base_Quantity_Nego__c < Slab_3__c || ISBLANK(Slab_3__c)), 2 , IF(Base_Quantity_Nego__c >= Slab_3__c && (Base_Quantity_Nego__c < Slab_4__c || ISBLANK(Slab_4__c)), 3 , IF(Base_Quantity_Nego__c >= Slab_4__c && (Base_Quantity_Nego__c < Slab_5__c || ISBLANK(Slab_5__c)), 4 , IF(Base_Quantity_Nego__c >= Slab_5__c && (Base_Quantity_Nego__c < Slab_6__c || ISBLANK(Slab_6__c)), 5 , IF(Base_Quantity_Nego__c >= Slab_6__c, 6 , null)))))), "Inc Prog Qty",
IF(Prog_Quantity_Nego__c >= Slab_1__c && (Prog_Quantity_Nego__c < Slab_2__c || ISBLANK(Slab_2__c)), 1 , IF(Prog_Quantity_Nego__c >= Slab_2__c && (Prog_Quantity_Nego__c < Slab_3__c || ISBLANK(Slab_3__c)), 2 , IF(Prog_Quantity_Nego__c >= Slab_3__c && (Prog_Quantity_Nego__c < Slab_4__c || ISBLANK(Slab_4__c)), 3 , IF(Prog_Quantity_Nego__c >= Slab_4__c && (Prog_Quantity_Nego__c < Slab_5__c || ISBLANK(Slab_5__c)), 4 , IF(Prog_Quantity_Nego__c >= Slab_5__c && (Prog_Quantity_Nego__c < Slab_6__c || ISBLANK(Slab_6__c)), 5 , IF(Prog_Quantity_Nego__c >= Slab_6__c, 6 , null)))))), null),null)
CustomField.label: Slab Reach - Nego Qty Inc
